item.description:
** Due to a stormy forecast, the ride has moved to SUNDAY @ 1pm **
Sunday looks like sunny skies so I hope that everyone can still make it.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This is going to be a casual ride, so all skill levels are welcome to come.

We will be going on an scenic 25 Mile loop through Swampscott, Marblehead, and Salem. We will be able to enjoy ocean views as we pedal along coastline of Marblehead Neck, and Salem Neck. After the ride we will enjoy ice-cream at Lime Rickey's (next to Red Rock Bistro).

There is an optional additional 11 miles, where we will ride down to Nahant and back.

View of Meet-Up Location
Route Map

Ride leaves promptly at 1:10pm
$2 meet-up fee which goes to Rob who pays for this meet-up group to exist. Please bring the 2 bucks to the meet-up.

See you there!
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be they guy admiring the ocean view. I'll also have my orange messenger bag as per usual.
item.why: Join us for a fun and scenic loop from Swampscott to Marblehead to Salem and back. Ice-cream at Lime Rickeys (next to Red Rock Bistro) after the ride.
item.name: 25 Mile Ocean Ride
